Original: That request? It is from the governor
of Tharsis... the Outland Count.
[Page]
He wants you to search for a small
grove of kapok trees.
[Page]
You can learn more by talking to him
at the [Color:5]Grand Court[Color:0]. I shall await
your swift return.
Translation: That request? It is from the governor
of Tharsis... the Outland Count.
[Page]
He wants you to search for a small
grove of kapok trees.
[Page]
You can learn more by talking to him
at the [Color:5]Grand Court[Color:0]. I shall await
your swift return.

Original: Congratulations on completing that
request. I heard all about it from
the Outland Count.
[Page]
The Count has a duty to cultivate his
city, so it is not rare for him to
enlist the help of explorers.
[Page]
In this way, the city prospers and
attracts more citizens. I would be
delighted to see Tharsis thrive.
[Page]
Here is the reward you were promised
by the Outland Count. I shall be
seeking your help again.
Translation: Congratulations on completing that
request. I heard all about it from
the Outland Count.
[Page]
The Count has a duty to cultivate his
city, so it is not rare for him to
enlist the help of explorers.
[Page]
In this way, the city prospers and
attracts more citizens. I would be
delighted to see Tharsis thrive.
[Page]
Here is the reward you were promised
by the Outland Count. I shall be
seeking your help again.

Original: Oh, you have accepted my request?
That is very reassuring!
[Page]
Are you familiar with kapoks? That
tree is not grown for food, but for
its several other uses.
[Page]
There is a place in these [Color:5]Windy Plains[Color:0]
where many kapoks grow. I want you to
search for this [Color:5]kapok grove[Color:0].
[Page]
Rumor has it that it's somewhere on
the [Color:5]northern side of the Windy Plains[Color:0].
The [Color:5]A-2[Color:0] region sounds likely.
[Page]
Oh, I'm sorry if my terminology is
confusing to you. Do you need an
explanation of maps and coordinates?
Translation: Oh, you have accepted my request?
That is very reassuring!
[Page]
Are you familiar with kapoks? That
tree is not grown for food, but for
its several other uses.
[Page]
There is a place in these [Color:5]Windy Plains[Color:0]
where many kapoks grow. I want you to
search for this [Color:5]kapok grove[Color:0].
[Page]
Rumor has it that it's somewhere on
the [Color:5]northern side of the Windy Plains[Color:0].
The [Color:5]A-2[Color:0] region sounds likely.
[Page]
Oh, I'm sorry if my terminology is
confusing to you. Do you need an
explanation of maps and coordinates?

Original: [Color:5]Listen to his explanation?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Listen to his explanation?[Color:0]

Original: Take a look at the map. Do you see the
numbers at the top and the letters on
the left side?
[Page]
Simply put, the numbers represent your
longitude while the letters show your
latitude.
[Page]
For example, the coordinates [Color:5]D-2[Color:0] are
on longitude D, latitude 2. It forms
a radius of about 25 spots.
[Page]
Tharsis itself is within D-4. That may
be a helpful thing to remember in your
future expeditions.
Translation: Take a look at the map. Do you see the
numbers at the top and the letters on
the left side?
[Page]
Simply put, the numbers represent your
longitude while the letters show your
latitude.
[Page]
For example, the coordinates [Color:5]D-2[Color:0] are
on longitude D, latitude 2. It forms
a radius of about 25 spots.
[Page]
Tharsis itself is within D-4. That may
be a helpful thing to remember in your
future expeditions.

Original: [Color:5]Do you understand coordinates?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Do you understand coordinates?[Color:0]

Original: Oh, my apologies. Of course this is
basic information for explorers.
Translation: Oh, my apologies. Of course this is
basic information for explorers.

Original: Now then, if you do happen to find the
kapok grove, return here and tell me
its coordinates.
[Page]
Of course, if you know them already,
do not hesitate! Let's have them!
Translation: Now then, if you do happen to find the
kapok grove, return here and tell me
its coordinates.
[Page]
Of course, if you know them already,
do not hesitate! Let's have them!

Original: Ah, my friends. Did you find it? That
kapok grove I'm after?
Translation: Ah, my friends. Did you find it? That
kapok grove I'm after?

Original: [Color:5]Did you find the kapok grove?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Did you find the kapok grove?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Hmm, the rumors say the kapok grove is
in area [Color:5]A-2[Color:0]. That should be in A on
the left side and 2 on the top.
Translation: Hmm, the rumors say the kapok grove is
in area [Color:5]A-2[Color:0]. That should be in A on
the left side and 2 on the top.

Original: Well, I'll continue to have patience
until you do. If you need more
details, you are always free to ask.
Translation: Well, I'll continue to have patience
until you do. If you need more
details, you are always free to ask.

Original: Oh, splendid! Here, point it out to
me on your map.
Translation: Oh, splendid! Here, point it out to
me on your map.

Original: Understood. Then I shall dispatch my
scouts to that location at once.
Translation: Understood. Then I shall dispatch my
scouts to that location at once.

Original: My scouts report that the kapok grove
was not where you said it should be.
[Page]
Were you in error, or...? Please look
into it further and report the exact
location to me.
Translation: My scouts report that the kapok grove
was not where you said it should be.
[Page]
Were you in error, or...? Please look
into it further and report the exact
location to me.

Original: My scouts report that they've just
found the kapok grove! It seems your
information was accurate.
[Page]
With these new resources, the city
will prosper. As its governor, I
thank you from the bottom of my heart.
[Page]
I have already contacted the Dancing
Peacock. You may return there to
report in and collect your reward.
Translation: My scouts report that they've just
found the kapok grove! It seems your
information was accurate.
[Page]
With these new resources, the city
will prosper. As its governor, I
thank you from the bottom of my heart.
[Page]
I have already contacted the Dancing
Peacock. You may return there to
report in and collect your reward.

Original: When you look directly below, you can
see a vast and lush [Color:5]kapok grove[Color:0].
[Page]
You can almost hear the rustling of
the trees thick with large, glossy,
green leaves.
[Page]
This is the fabled kapok grove!
[Page]
You must simply mark its location so
as not to forget and report to the
Outland Count to fulfill the request!
Translation: When you look directly below, you can
see a vast and lush [Color:5]kapok grove[Color:0].
[Page]
You can almost hear the rustling of
the trees thick with large, glossy,
green leaves.
[Page]
This is the fabled kapok grove!
[Page]
You must simply mark its location so
as not to forget and report to the
Outland Count to fulfill the request!

Original: Is something the matter, my friends?
Your reward is waiting! Why not go to
the Dancing Peacock and report in?
Translation: Is something the matter, my friends?
Your reward is waiting! Why not go to
the Dancing Peacock and report in?

Original: When you look directly below, you can
see the vast and lush [Color:5]kapok grove[Color:0].
[Page]
You can almost hear the rustling of
the trees as their glossy, green
leaves take in the sun's blessing.
[Page]
The beauty of the Windy Plains' rich
greenery is a balm for your soul...
Translation: When you look directly below, you can
see the vast and lush [Color:5]kapok grove[Color:0].
[Page]
You can almost hear the rustling of
the trees as their glossy, green
leaves take in the sun's blessing.
[Page]
The beauty of the Windy Plains' rich
greenery is a balm for your soul...
